mapper.select:
select car.id as id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner
from crm.tbl_activity a join crm.tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id join crm.tbl_clue_activity_relation car on a.id = car.activityId where car.clueId = #{clueId};

select a.id, a.name, u.name as owner, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy from crm.tbl_activity a join crm.tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.id = #{id};
mapper.update: update crm.tbl_activity set owner=#{owner}, name=#{name}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, cost=#{cost}, description=#{description}, editTime=#{editTime}, editBy=#{editBy} where id = #{id};
mapper.insert:
insert into crm.tbl_activity(id, owner, name, startDate, endDate, cost, description, createTime, createBy)
values (#{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{cost}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy});
